plugins.name: Copy selection colors
plugins.description:
I found myself needing to copy the color values of a large selection recently, which was quite a manual process.


This plugin allows you to copy the HEX or RGBA values of a batch selection in Figma.

accepted.name: Luis Ouriach
accepted.description:
Design & community @figmadesign. I write a newsletter, manage and host @8pxmag. 

Hot sauce on everything.

plugins.tagline: A utility plugin which allows you to copy the HEX or RGBA values from a selection.

102933.name: Copy selection colors

This plugin allows you to copy the HEX or RGBA values of a batch selection in Figma.
102933.tagline: A utility plugin which allows you to copy the HEX or RGBA values from a selection.

plugins.name: Source insight | Import Your Daily Screenshots
plugins.description:
일상 속 수집했던 레퍼런스 이미지들,

손쉽게 피그마에서 바로 활용할 수 있어요!


[쏘스 활용 방법]


  1. 일상생활에서 수집한 레퍼런스 이미지들을 쏘스에 업로드해요.
  2. 피그마에서 쏘스 플러그인을 통해 이미지들을 바로 import 하고 디자인 작업에 참고할 수 있어요.
  3. 다른 팀원이 업로드한 쏘스도 바로 살펴보고 import할 수 있어요.


*쏘스 모바일 앱은 iOS 환경만 지원하고 있습니다.

앱 다운로드 : http://apple.co/3JuTGw2

웹 랜딩 페이지 : http://bit.ly/3LzzSdU


—


Now access your daily reference image collections,

seamlessly in Figma!


[How to use Source for Figma]


  1. Upload your reference images to Source
  2. Import your Source images into Figma with the Source plug-in, then off you go, do your design!
  3. You can also import from your team space.


*Currently Source is only available at iOS.

App download : http://apple.co/3JuTGw2

Web : http://bit.ly/3LzzSdU
plugins.tagline: Now access your daily reference image collections, seamlessly in Figma!

plugins.name: Font Manager
plugins.description: You can select any text boxes and change the font of a specific text type. Currently only supports Korean, English, and numerical value.
plugins.tagline: Select a Text box and change the font of selected Text Type!

110510.name: Font Manager
110510.description: You can select any text boxes and change the font of a specific text type. Currently only supports Korean, English, and numerical value.
110510.release_notes:
1. Improved multi-language text detection and font application:
    Added support for Chinese (Traditional & Simplified)
    Added support for Japanese (Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji)
    Added support for Hindi (Devanagari script)

2. Enhanced symbol and number handling:
    Better separation between numerical values and symbols
    More precise detection of special characters and punctuation
    Fixed issues where numbers and symbols were being confused

3. Upgraded text processing algorithm:
    More accurate script detection for mixed-language text
    Better handling of consecutive characters in the same script
    Improved detection of language boundaries in mixed text

Switched from regex-based to Unicode-range-based detection
More efficient text processing with single-pass analysis
Better grouping of continuous text ranges for font application
110510.tagline: Select a Text box and change the font of selected Text Type!

plugins.name: Color Tint Shades
plugins.description: Color Tint Shades is designed to streamline color management. With it, you can instantly generate shades from any base color, allowing for a smooth transition between lighter and darker variations. This plugin is perfect for creating cohesive color palettes, enhancing UI elements, and ensuring consistency across your entire design system.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate tints from any base color for smooth transitions between light and dark.

plugins.name: My Real Plugin
plugins.description:
My Real Plugin: Figma 플러그인 정리 도우미


MRP (My Real Plugin)를 통해 피그마 플러그인을 손쉽게 정리하고 관리해 보세요. 다양한 플러그인을 효율적으로 정리할 수 있으며, 처음 피그마를 사용하는 디자이너라면 카테고리별로 많이 사용되는 플러그인을 추천받을 수 있습니다.


주요 기능:


1. 플러그인 정리하기: 내가 사용하는 플러그인들을 검색하거나, URL을 이용해서 카테고리별로 정리해보세요. 평소 활용하는 플러그인들이 많다면 유용하게 활용할 수 있습니다.

2. 많이 사용되는 플러그인 추천: 특정 카테고리에서 많이 쓰이는 플러그인들은 URL이 없어도 MRP에서 바로 추가할 수 있습니다. 즉, 일일이 URL을 찾지 않고도 MRP 내에서 인기 플러그인을 쉽게 추가할 수 있죠.


활용 방법:


- 피그마 초보자: 피그마를 처음 시작했을 때 어떤 플러그인을 써야 할지 막막하다면, MRP에 있는 카테고리별로 추천된 플러그인들을 확인해보세요. 자주 쓰이는 플러그인들을 한눈에 보고 내 리스트에 추가할 수 있습니다.

- 효율적인 관리: 자주 쓰는 플러그인을 미리 저장해두면, 매번 검색할 필요 없이 필요한 순간에 빠르게 찾아 사용할 수 있어 작업 효율이 높아집니다.


  1. 피그마에서 많은 플러그인을 사용하는 디자이너라면, MRP가 필수입니다. 매번 어떤 플러그인을 사용할지 고민할 필요 없이, 한 번 저장해둔 플러그인을 빠르게 찾아 시간을 절약하고 더 효율적으로 작업해 보세요.



My Real Plugin: Figma Plugin Organizer


Plugin Introduction

Make your design work more efficient! MRP is a plugin that helps designers intuitively organize and manage numerous plugins. It simplifies your design process and helps you quickly find the tools you need.


Key Features

  1. Customizable Categories: Add and manage categories as you wish to build your own plugin archive.
  2. Intuitive UI: Escape from complex plugin management with an easy and simple user interface. Find the plugins you want with just a few clicks.
  3. Favorites Feature: Add frequently used plugins to your favorites for quick access anytime.


Future Features

  1. Search and Filter Functionality
  2. Plugin Ranking and Recommendation Features


If you need any more information, free to ask!
plugins.tagline: orgainize your plugins

108174.name: My Real Plugin
108174.description:
My Real Plugin: Figma 플러그인 정리 도우미


MRP (My Real Plugin)를 통해 피그마 플러그인을 손쉽게 정리하고 관리해 보세요. 다양한 플러그인을 효율적으로 정리할 수 있으며, 처음 피그마를 사용하는 디자이너라면 카테고리별로 많이 사용되는 플러그인을 추천받을 수 있습니다.

  1. 피그마에서 많은 플러그인을 사용하는 디자이너라면, MRP가 필수입니다. 매번 어떤 플러그인을 사용할지 고민할 필요 없이, 한 번 저장해둔 플러그인을 빠르게 찾아 시간을 절약하고 더 효율적으로 작업해 보세요.



My Real Plugin: Figma Plugin Organizer


Plugin Introduction

Make your design work more efficient! MRP is a plugin that helps designers intuitively organize and manage numerous plugins. It simplifies your design process and helps you quickly find the tools you need.


Key Features

  1. Customizable Categories: Add and manage categories as you wish to build your own plugin archive.
  2. Intuitive UI: Escape from complex plugin management with an easy and simple user interface. Find the plugins you want with just a few clicks.
  3. Favorites Feature: Add frequently used plugins to your favorites for quick access anytime.


Future Features

  1. Search and Filter Functionality
  2. Plugin Ranking and Recommendation Features


If you need any more information, free to ask!
108174.release_notes:
내 플러그인의 이름을 복사하는 기능을 추가했어요. 
복사하고 바로 액션모달(cmd+k)에 붙여넣어서 디자인 파일에서 원하는 플러그인을 실행시켜보세요~!

plugins.name: PixelBin.io
plugins.description:
PixelBin.io (Figma Plugin) is an AI-based image transformation platform that gives you simple tool for asset management and transforming images with high quality. The user can use this plugin for multiple uses such as; Upload/Download images, resizing images, applying filters, sharpening images, removing watermarks, removing background, bulk transformation and much more, right from your Figma (web/desktop).


Stay Connected!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pixelbinio

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pixelbinio1

𝕏(Twitter): https://twitter.com/PixelBinio

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/usepixelbin

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@pixelbinio
plugins.tagline: Real-time image transformations, optimisations and asset management.

plugins.name: FrameHider
plugins.description:
FrameHider - No peeking


Is your design work not yet complete? Do you want to hide certain frames from viewers temporarily? With FrameHider, you can easily hide one or more frames.


设计还未完成？不想让查看者看到某一个画板？FrameHider 可以简单、快速的临时遮住画板。选中一个或多个画板，然后运行插件。

FrameHider - No peeking


Is your design work not yet complete? Do you want to hide certain frames from viewers temporarily? With FrameHider, you can easily hide one or more frames.

plugins.name: Marvelous Avatars
plugins.description:
What You Can Expect from This Plugin

  1. Generate Unique Marvel Avatars: Easily create avatars featuring Marvel’s iconic characters for use in your designs, perfect for adding a heroic touch to user profiles, mockups, and more.
  2. Fill Shapes with Marvel Images: Instantly fill any shape in your Figma design with high-quality images from the Marvel universe, making your designs visually captivating and thematic.
  3. Marvel-Themed Lorem Ipsum: Replace standard placeholder text with fun and engaging Marvel data text, adding character and flair to your design mockups.
  4. Prefilled Data or Real-Time Fetching: Use the plugin’s prefilled Marvel data for quick access or connect your own Marvel Developer API credentials to fetch collections by name, randomly, or page by page, for the most up-to-date content.


Perfect for Designers Who

  1. Work on projects related to comics, superheroes, or fan sites.
  2. Want to bring a pop culture twist to their design work.
  3. Need unique placeholder content that stands out.
  4. With "Marvelous Avatars," you can quickly integrate Marvel’s universe into your Figma projects, enhancing your designs with iconic characters and stories.
plugins.tagline: Bring Marvel Universe to your Figma designs

121499.description:

  3. Marvel-Themed Lorem Ipsum: Replace standard placeholder text with fun and engaging Marvel data text, adding character and flair to your design mockups.
  4. Prefilled Data or Real-Time Fetching: Use the plugin’s prefilled Marvel data for quick access or connect your own Marvel Developer API credentials to fetch collections by name, randomly, or page by page, for the most up-to-date content.

121499.tagline: Bring Marvel Universe to your Figma designs

plugins.name: Varcraft – Find, Replace & Detach Variables
plugins.description:
Varcraft is a beautifully simple Figma plugin. Quickly find, detach, and replace variables in your designs—streamline your workflow in just a click.


How it works

  1. Select your object or frame.
  2. Instantly see all applied variables and their types.
  3. Choose which variables to detach or replace—simple and done!


Key features:

🆕 Easy Replacement: Replace variables across multiple layers or components.

🔎 Instant Search: Quickly find the exact variables you need.

🪄 Automation: Instantly analyzes your selection, showing results in seconds.

💡 Variable Overview: Clearly shows all variables and their types.

🎯 Precision Detachment: Accurately detach variables without affecting your designs.

🖍 Error Detection: Highlights missing or broken variable links, keeping your projects error-free.

☑️ Complexity Simplified: Easily handles nested layers and complex components, making your designs simpler to manage.


⚠️ Note: Doesn't support Effects variables (yet!).

accepted.name: Pecherin Maxim
accepted.description: Frontend developer obsessed with Figma plugins 🧠💡✨

plugins.tagline: An easy way to remove applied variables.

126153.name: Varcraft – Find, Replace & Detach Variables
126153.description:
Varcraft is a beautifully simple Figma plugin. Quickly find, detach, and replace variables in your designs—streamline your workflow in just a click.


How it works

  1. Select your object or frame.
  2. Instantly see all applied variables and their types.
  3. Choose which variables to detach or replace—simple and done!


Key features:

🆕 Easy Replacement: Replace variables across multiple layers or components.

🔎 Instant Search: Quickly find the exact variables you need.

🪄 Automation: Instantly analyzes your selection, showing results in seconds.

💡 Variable Overview: Clearly shows all variables and their types.

🎯 Precision Detachment: Accurately detach variables without affecting your designs.

🖍 Error Detection: Highlights missing or broken variable links, keeping your projects error-free.

☑️ Complexity Simplified: Easily handles nested layers and complex components, making your designs simpler to manage.


⚠️ Note: Doesn't support Effects variables (yet!).

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin sends usage analytics to our backend server during production and development to improve plugin functionality and monitor usage.

126153.release_notes: Refreshed UI, added variable swap feature
126153.tagline: An easy way to remove applied variables.

plugins.name: Devstimates
plugins.description:
Enable devs and designers to provide estimates for components and export them to a CSV.

-----------------------------------

Usage:

- Start the plugin
- Click on any frame
- Add new line item and provide a label and value
- Click save

Once you save, a roll up of all time estimates will be show with an option to export to CSV.

-----------------------------------

Feel free to write me if you have any problem or feedback (:
Please use the GitHub Issues (https://github.com/fvaldes33/figma-estimator-plugin/issues) or follow me on twitter and write me a DM @francoxavier33

6593.name: Devstimates
6593.description:
Enable devs and designers to provide estimates for components and export them to a CSV.

-----------------------------------

Usage:

- Start the plugin
- Click on any frame
- Add new line item and provide a label and value
- Click save

Once you save, a roll up of all time estimates will be show with an option to export to CSV.

-----------------------------------

Feel free to write me if you have any problem or feedback (:
Please use the GitHub Issues (https://github.com/fvaldes33/figma-estimator-plugin/issues) or follow me on twitter and write me a DM @francoxavier33

plugins.name: Bulk replacement of text
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to instantly update your table designs by copying and pasting values from spreadsheet applications like Excel or Google Sheets.


The table design can be used whether it is a component or not!


With built-in conditional text formatting, you can automatically apply color rules to your text - for example, displaying positive values in green and negative values in red.

(You can also specify UI library color variables)
plugins.tagline: Bulk rewrite text in your table design.

plugins.name: Text to Stickies for toitta
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、主に発話分析ソリューション「toitta」を利用しているユーザーに便利な機能を提供しています。


Text to Stickies for toittaは、toittaで一括コピーしたテキスト（切片）を簡単に付箋としてFigma/FigJamに出力できるプラグインです。

操作は直感的で、toittaからコピーしたテキストをプラグインUIにペーストするだけ。付箋はハイパーリンクとして生成され、リンクをクリックすることで該当するtoittaの切片に素早くアクセスできます。

ユーザーがデザインやリサーチのプロセスを効率化するための強力なツールです。


機能説明：


⚫︎テキストの付箋化

toittaからコピーしたテキスト切片をそのままペーストして、付箋としてFigma/FigJamに追加できます。


⚫︎ハイパーリンク生成

付箋にはリンクが含まれており、toittaの該当切片にワンクリックで移動可能です。


⚫︎簡単操作

直感的なUIで、複雑な操作を必要とせず、数ステップで作業を完了できます。


関連リンク：

toitta サービスLP

https://ja.toitta.com/
plugins.tagline: 発話分析ソリューション「toitta」を利用するユーザーに便利なFigmaプラグインです。toittaで一括コピーしたテキスト切片を、ワンクリックで簡単に付箋として出力できます。

plugins.name: Clear Bottom
plugins.description:
Clear Bottom: A Simple Figma Plugin for Lazy Designers


Hello Figma Community!


I’m excited to introduce my new plugin, Clear Bottom, crafted for those who want to simplify their workflow without any development experience.


What is Clear Bottom?


Clear Bottom is a straightforward Figma plugin designed to tackle a common issue: the empty area at the bottom of your frames. If you’ve ever faced the frustration of manually adjusting each frame to remove these gaps, this plugin is here to help.


How Does It Work?


  1. Select Multiple Frames (Or single): Choose the frames with gaps at the bottom.
  2. Run the Plugin: Clear Bottom automatically removes the empty space at the bottom of each selected frame.
  3. Preserves Design Elements: Your design elements stay in place and unchanged.


Feel free to provide feedback or ask questions. I hope this plugin makes your design process a bit smoother!


Happy designing!
plugins.tagline: Clear empty bottom space in Figma frames effortlessly, without moving or resizing elements in them.

100108.name: Clear Bottom
100108.description:
Clear Bottom: A Simple Figma Plugin for Lazy Designers


Hello Figma Community!


I’m excited to introduce my new plugin, Clear Bottom, crafted for those who want to simplify their workflow without any development experience.


What is Clear Bottom?

How Does It Work?


  1. Select Multiple Frames (Or single): Choose the frames with gaps at the bottom.
  2. Run the Plugin: Clear Bottom automatically removes the empty space at the bottom of each selected frame.
  3. Preserves Design Elements: Your design elements stay in place and unchanged.


Feel free to provide feedback or ask questions. I hope this plugin makes your design process a bit smoother!


Happy designing!
100108.tagline: Clear empty bottom space in Figma frames effortlessly, without moving or resizing elements in them.

plugins.name: bboxify
plugins.description:
Tools like Nuke often require bounding boxes to position, crop, animate (etc.) elements. One way to send bounding box values to Nuke is bundling the x/y positions, width and height into a comma-separated string, such as:

"1189.390625,492,379.609375,78"


The order of these values is always the same:

  1. x position
  2. y position
  3. width
  4. height


The bounding box can be previewed based on this in tools like Nuke, however, if these values are generated and sent from eg. a Javascript app, it could get a little tricky to accurately view and check these bounding boxes as they may be influenced by certain CSS parameters.


This little plugin aims to solve this. Drop an image into Figma on which you'd like to check the bounding boxes, then right-click on it -> Plugins -> bboxify to start the plugin. You can search for it and install it from Figma's Community page if you don't have it yet.


After starting the plugin, all you need to do it enter the bounding box values into the input field. 4 values (following the above-mentioned order) represent one full rectangle. Make sure each value is separated by a comma.


You may also enter more than 4 values in which case more than one rectangle will be created. For example, if you enter 12 values, 3 rectangles will be created (as 3x4 = 12), which may be useful if you're generating bounding boxes around each character of a text element. The order of each value will be the same in this case as well, just repeated:

  1. x position of 1st rectangle
  2. y position of 1st rectangle
  3. width of 1st rectangle
  4. height of 1st rectangle
  5. x position of 2nd rectangle
  6. y position of 2nd rectangle
  7. width of 2nd rectangle
  8. height of 2nd rectangle


etc.


This means you don't have to manually create rectangles one-by-one in Figma to double-check the accuracy of the boxes you generate on the frontend.
plugins.tagline: Create rectangles based on comma-separated bounding box values

63620.name: bboxify
63620.description:
Tools like Nuke often require bounding boxes to position, crop, animate (etc.) elements. One way to send bounding box values to Nuke is bundling the x/y positions, width and height into a comma-separated string, such as:

"1189.390625,492,379.609375,78"


The order of these values is always the same:

  1. x position
  2. y position
  3. width
  4. height


The bounding box can be previewed based on this in tools like Nuke, however, if these values are generated and sent from eg. a Javascript app, it could get a little tricky to accurately view and check these bounding boxes as they may be influenced by certain CSS parameters.


This little plugin aims to solve this. Drop an image into Figma on which you'd like to check the bounding boxes, then right-click on it -> Plugins -> bboxify to start the plugin. You can search for it and install it from Figma's Community page if you don't have it yet.


After starting the plugin, all you need to do it enter the bounding box values into the input field. 4 values (following the above-mentioned order) represent one full rectangle. Make sure each value is separated by a comma.


You may also enter more than 4 values in which case more than one rectangle will be created. For example, if you enter 12 values, 3 rectangles will be created (as 3x4 = 12), which may be useful if you're generating bounding boxes around each character of a text element. The order of each value will be the same in this case as well, just repeated:

  1. x position of 1st rectangle
  2. y position of 1st rectangle
  3. width of 1st rectangle
  4. height of 1st rectangle
  5. x position of 2nd rectangle
  6. y position of 2nd rectangle
  7. width of 2nd rectangle
  8. height of 2nd rectangle


etc.


This means you don't have to manually create rectangles one-by-one in Figma to double-check the accuracy of the boxes you generate on the frontend.
63620.release_notes: Added error messages in case user enters insufficient or incorrect values in one of the fields + minor UI tweaks
63620.tagline: Create rectangles based on comma-separated bounding box values

plugins.name: Figma to Kontakt
plugins.description:
Implementing UIs in KSP has been painful manual process, until now.


Using F2K's visual syntax in your designs, you can generate the implementation code and speed up your workflow by at least a couple orders of magnitude.


F2K now has a custom Font Generator module that allows adjustment of horizontal character spacing, vertical offset, it has a monospace option and supports text effects!


https://figmatokontakt.com - sign up and get rolling. FREE!


General tutorial dropped!

https://youtu.be/D7lqAV1KRKw
plugins.tagline: UI design to KSP code in one click. But wait, there's much more.

plugins.name: Detach Local Components
plugins.description:
This plug-in detaches all instances and their children if their main components are defined in this file, while preserving the instances of library components. It is developed for designers who use a design system to take a snapshot of their design during iteration.


How to use:

  1. Select anything contains instances
  2. Run the plug-in


Limitation: If a local instance is inside of a library instance, it will be not be detached.


NOTE: You are responsible for testing the plug-in before use or keeping a copy of your file to prevent any potential damage. If you need to undo the detach, use Ctrl + Z.
plugins.tagline: Detach instances of local components while keeping external ones intact

99737.description:

plugins.name: Connect Styles
plugins.description:
Color styles sometimes get detached. It can be time consuming to manually reconnect them all.


Connect Styles is the super easy fix for this:


1) Scan your page for detached Color Styles

2) Reconnect colors to their Color Styles


That's it! You can either reconnect all Color Styles at once, or one at the time for more control.


Pricing

You can use this plugin 3 times for free. Figma doesn't allow paid plugins to go cheaper dan $2 per month. Thats why the yearly plan has a discount of 63%, so that the total price of a license is only $8,88


Cancelation


Subscriptions are handled by Figma. You can cancel the plugin subscription by:


Clicking your profile avatar in the top-left corner of Figma

Click Settings

Click Community and find the section Community purchases.

Click the three dots ... next to Skew It Let's Do It

Click Manage subscription

In the newly opened Stripe portal, select Cancel Plan


Cheers and stay connected! ♡
plugins.tagline: Reconnect detached Color Styles

109325.name: Connect Styles
109325.description:
Color styles sometimes get detached. It can be time consuming to manually reconnect them all.


Connect Styles is the super easy fix for this:


1) Scan your page for detached Color Styles

2) Reconnect colors to their Color Styles


That's it! You can either reconnect all Color Styles at once, or one at the time for more control.


Pricing

You can use this plugin 3 times for free. Figma doesn't allow paid plugins to go cheaper dan $2 per month. Thats why the yearly plan has a discount of 63%, so that the total price of a license is only $8,88


Cancelation

Clicking your profile avatar in the top-left corner of Figma

Click Settings

Click Community and find the section Community purchases.

Click the three dots ... next to Skew It Let's Do It

Click Manage subscription

In the newly opened Stripe portal, select Cancel Plan


Cheers and stay connected! ♡

plugins.name: GPTの设计锦囊
plugins.description:
🚀 Unleash Your Creativity With ChatGPT🚀


欢迎使用设计锦囊！本插件可以帮助你快速打造自己的ChatGPT锦囊，让你的创意随时跃然纸上！


使用方法非常简单，只需几个步骤即可完成：


1. 打开插件，选择创建锦囊；

2. 添加对话内容，规定场景和角色的设定；

3. 点击生成，即可快速得到属于你自己的ChatGPT锦囊！


除此之外，本插件未来还计划支持多模态交互，文档摘要，让你的创意更加灵活多样。不论是设计师还是创作者，都可以用这个插件打造自己的作品，让灵感无限扩展！


Welcome to Design Toolkit!


This plugin can help you quickly create your own ChatGPT toolkit, allowing your creativity to come to life at any time!


The instructions for use are very simple, requiring only a few steps:

  1. Open the plugin and select "Create Toolkit".
  2. Add dialogue content and specify the settings for the scene and characters.
  3. Click "Generate" to quickly obtain your own ChatGPT toolkit!


In addition, this plugin plans to support multimodal interaction and document summarization in the future, making your creativity more flexible and diverse.


Whether you are a designer or a creator, you can use this plugin to create your own work and expand your inspiration limitlessly!
plugins.tagline: 只需几秒钟，打造自己的GPT助手。随时激发灵感，让创意跃然纸上。

plugins.name: Fluent Icons
plugins.description:
Fluent Icons is Microsoft's official icon system, designed to provide a consistent and modern look across all Microsoft products and services. This collection includes over 4,000 icons that follow the Fluent Design System principles, ensuring visual consistency and accessibility.


Microsoft 官方图标系统，提供 4,000+ 个高质量、风格统一的图标，适用于现代应用程序开发。


Features

  1. 4,000+ professionally designed icons
  2. Consistent with Microsoft's Fluent Design System
  3. Multiple sizes (16, 20, 24, 28, 32, 48px)
  4. Regular and Filled styles
  5. High contrast support
  6. SVG format for perfect scaling
  7. Easy to use in Figma
  8. Drag and drop support
  9. Search functionality
  10. Color customization
  11. Size adjustment


Use Cases

  1. Web Applications
  2. Desktop Applications
  3. Mobile Apps
  4. Design Systems
  5. UI/UX Design
  6. Documentation
  7. Presentations
  8. Brand Guidelines


TAGS

  1. microsoft fluent
  2. fluent design
  3. fluent icons
  4. microsoft icons
  5. fluent ui
  6. fluent design system
  7. fluent icon set
  8. microsoft design
  9. fluent style
  10. fluent svg
  11. fluent figma
  12. fluent plugin
  13. fluent design icons
  14. microsoft fluent icons

  16. fluent design system icons

  3. Multiple sizes (16, 20, 24, 28, 32, 48px)
  4. Regular and Filled styles
  5. High contrast support
  6. SVG format for perfect scaling
  7. Easy to use in Figma
  8. Drag and drop support
  9. Search functionality
  10. Color customization
  11. Size adjustment


Use Cases

  1. Web Applications
  2. Desktop Applications
  3. Mobile Apps
  4. Design Systems
  5. UI/UX Design
  6. Documentation
  7. Presentations
  8. Brand Guidelines

plugins.name: Typography Analyzer
plugins.description:
Typography Optimizer is the ultimate plugin for UI designers looking to enhance their text layers with precision and efficiency.


It focuses exclusively on analyzing text, skipping empty layers and frames, and provides actionable suggestions for improving font usage, line heights, and contrast.


Ensure your designs follow UI best practices and accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG 2.1) while maintaining consistency with your design system.


Typography Optimizer simplifies typography management for flawless, user-friendly designs.

accepted.name: ASSIST Software
accepted.description:
Design work that converts. 
From idea to market 🚀
Design team @ ASSIST Software

plugins.tagline: Optimize text layers for consistent and accessible typography.

plugins.name: Interlinked
plugins.description:
Interlined makes it easy to navigate in Design Mode within Figma file, even across pages.


When you run Interlinked for the first time, it will create ‘interlink’ component for you.


Restyle your links

You can change the component whatever you like, but it must have ‘interlink’ text node to work.


Use your components

You can also use Interlinked with your components of choice, as long as they have a text node named 'interlink'. Select 2 instances and run Interlined from the Command Palette (`Cmd+/`).


Set default component

Now when you run the plugin on custom components you can set is as default from toast notification. Next time you run Interlined without selection, links will be created using new components.


Fix broken link

Links can and will bet broken when you change the text of the link, or if you copy and paste the node. Run the plugin from the Design Panel, then the node is selected to get the link fixed.


Works with interactions

You can enable Presentation mode interactions from the Design Panel and the page level. It’s off by default because it can lead to a messy workspace, and Figma creates a starting point, which you probably don't need.
plugins.tagline: Link two nodes together to navigate in Design mode. Within Figma Interlinked. Interlinked.

85245.release_notes: fixing presentation mode on-click linking as it was borked by the changes in Figma API. Should be good now, but remember that presentation mode interactions are off by default and you have to toggle the thing after you first use the plugin.
85245.tagline: Link two nodes together to navigate in Design mode. Within Figma Interlinked. Interlinked.

plugins.name: Color Ramp Generator
plugins.description:
Introducing the Color Ramp Generator plugin - designed to streamline your workflow and ensure accessibility across all your designs. This tool allows you to generate a color ramp from any HEX color you provide, ensuring each color meets predefined contrast ratios for accessibility.


Simply enter your HEX code (with or without the “#”), give it a name and the plugin will automatically generate a 15-color gradient. It adjusts the lightness to meet the exact contrast ratios, while preserving the hue and saturation of your colors.


This color system integrates accessibility directly into your design process. In my past projects, clients often provided incomplete brand guidelines, especially regarding accessibility. To solve this, I created a method to generate accessible color ramps, assigning each shade a number for easy reference. I specifically built this system to support white-labeling requirements, enabling quick and easy customization for different brands while maintaining accessibility standards.


Each color in the palette is numbered from 5 to 100, with the darkest color assigned “5” and the brightest color assigned “100.”


Here’s the key feature: a points-based color system.

• A 40-point difference between shades meets a 3:1 contrast ratio.

• A 50-point difference meets a 4.5:1 ratio.

• A 60-point difference meets a 7:1 ratio.


This system allows you to easily achieve AA and AAA accessibility standards by assigning colors to objects accordingly.


Cross-Palette Accessibility: This feature ensures that colors from different palettes are also accessible when combined. For example, Color 30 from one palette and Color 80 from another palette will automatically have a 50-point difference, which meets the 4.5:1 contrast ratio requirement. This makes it easy to mix colors from different palettes while maintaining accessibility.


The output generated is clean and ready for use in your design system, ensuring that your designs not only meet accessibility standards but also look polished and professional.


With this system, you can reduce your toolkit setup time from days to under a minute, saving 99% of the time.
plugins.tagline: Create color shades to establish a color system.

plugins.name: Pixo
plugins.description:
Pixo is your go-to plugin for clean and precise designs. With just a few clicks, Pixo rounds the values of your design elements, including positions, sizes, rotation angles, corner radii, and text properties. Whether you’re a perfectionist who wants every pixel to align perfectly or you just want to clean up your design files, Pixo simplifies the process and ensures consistency across your project.


Created by Ilia Nalimov as a part of Wonderful Plugins

accepted.name: Ilia Nalimov
accepted.description: Design enthusiast. Passionate about design for humans.

plugins.tagline: Get rid of subpixels

plugins.name: Brand book builder (by Blursday)
plugins.description:
The Brand Book Generator enables startup teams to create and manage their brand guidelines quickly and easily. It allows team admins to build and modify their brand books, capturing essential details about their brand's identity, aesthetics, and mission. The tool uses AI to analyze user input and generate a comprehensive brand book, complete with communication guidelines, color palettes, typography, and visual styles.


NOTE: The tool does not generate any graphics (yet)

plugins.name: Color Luminance Manager

plugins.name: WN Helper v1.0 [Release version]
plugins.description:
ATTENTION! This plugin was created for sharing by me and my friends in our special projects. Some of the functions do not work in other documents due to the different organization of layers and components.


Public functions that may be of interest to you:


- Quick creation of frames for creating multiple variants of social network avatars (500x500 size).


- Export the content of any frame to an image for

instant fill insertion for any selected element. (Very useful for copying any frame and pasting it as a background for any of your designs).


- Fast loading of any number of selected elements as PNG images. (Allows you to export individual items to different customer folders faster).


- Changing the background color of the work page (This is convenient for checking the most contrasting background of my work, but this function is already built into Figma by default)


--------------------------------------------------------


My personal functions working in a special project:


- Quick placement of texts with time units (conjugation of words)


- Checking my project (components) for the presence of prohibited (bad) words for search engines


- Quick selection of elements in my components


- Changing the size of texts to fit the required width and height of the element.


- Change component options in a couple of clicks


- Several options for importing and exporting texts to my components.


- Export and import the contents of my components to a CSV file.


- Import and export images and icons to my components.


- Moving and reversing the order of components in my frames.


- Change the colors of the elements.


--------------------------------------------------------


The project has localization in English and Russian, the ability to sort functions for the tasks of the working day and the type of customers, a settings section that helps manage the work of the plugin.


--------------------------------------------------------


Figma is a moderator, I have already submitted this plugin three times for moderation and I hope that I have fixed all its shortcomings.


I added a contact email in the text of this description, in the mail section in the application and also indicated the contact me button in the plugin itself. I also added canvas modification functions for all Figma users so that the plugin would be useful to everyone. I checked it for errors within a few working days and I really hope that you will approve it for publication.

42499.name: WN Helper v1.0 [Release version]
42499.description:

- Changing the background color of the work page (This is convenient for checking the most contrasting background of my work, but this function is already built into Figma by default)


--------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------


The project has localization in English and Russian, the ability to sort functions for the tasks of the working day and the type of customers, a settings section that helps manage the work of the plugin.


--------------------------------------------------------


Figma is a moderator, I have already submitted this plugin three times for moderation and I hope that I have fixed all its shortcomings.


I added a contact email in the text of this description, in the mail section in the application and also indicated the contact me button in the plugin itself. I also added canvas modification functions for all Figma users so that the plugin would be useful to everyone. I checked it for errors within a few working days and I really hope that you will approve it for publication.
42499.release_notes: Speeding up the script, solving errors with a lack of data, a couple of new text insertion functions

plugins.name: NumberGenerator
plugins.description:
A simple figma plugin to assign numbers to selected text fields. Select nodes in figma and start the plugin. Only textnodes will be touched.


The plugin provides a simple UI where you can define FROM and TO range. Additionally you can define the ordering.


Parameter support to use the plugin without UI.


Github: https://github.com/danielkagemann/figma-numbergenerator

plugins.name: LZ Rename All Frames
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin that helps you rename all frames in your file with a custom name and adds an increment counter to each frame.


With this you give a name to be used for reaming and it simply names your layers with the inputed name and ads a number.


eg If Name is given as Authentication the file names will be Authentication 1, Authentication 2 etc


How to use

  1. Run plugin
  2. Enter frame name ( optional )
  3. Click rename

accepted.name: Ogar Emmanuel
accepted.description:
UI UX designer at night, print designer during the day.
Follow me on instagram if you got questions or need more of my designs

plugins.tagline: Custom rename layers
